description: Coverage-focused persona scenarios to close underrepresented dimensions (analyst, social-media, connectors, generic domain, and explicit end-to-end workflows).

cases.prompt: An analyst is investigating coordinated social-media claim reuse. Provide one concise Python workflow from a posts table to a share-safe graph: normalize claim text into a key, compute claim reuse counts, shape edges+nodes for users and claims, style by reuse risk, and call plot(render=False).

Provide a compact connector triage snippet for an analyst using Neo4j or Splunk data with a dataframe fallback: mention connector choice, shape with edges(...).nodes(...), set private or organization privacy, and produce plot(render=False).

For a non-fraud, non-cyber operations dataset, provide an end-to-end Python workflow from raw tabular records to a Graphistry visualization: include ingest, light ETL shaping, edges+nodes binding, one metric enrichment, and plot(render=False). Keep it concise.
